# Knowledge Assessment Dashboards (SY22-23)

```{r active-dashboards, echo = F, layout = "l-page"}
library(bs4cards)

report_galleries <- tibble::tibble(
  location = c("Math: Raise"),
  long_name = location,
  image_url = c(here::here("Images/Dashboards/QualtricsKnowledgeAssessment.png")),
  link = c("https://teachinglab.co1.qualtrics.com/reporting-dashboard/#/dashboard/62de301749ba9b00171caa9b?pageId=Page_412ac85d-62f0-4a2c-8af4-ccbb31d7ce0d")
)

report_galleries |>
  cards(
    title = "",
    footer = long_name,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    width = 2,
    layout = "inset-bottom",
    spacing = 3
  )
```
